attributes.action: Cease charging churches for the amount of area that will collect rainwater
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This charge should not be introduced.  It is just another, not very subtle attempt, to further increase the already ridiculous profits made by water suppliers.  It is time OFFWAT grew some teeth and acted more strongly in the interests of consumers.  Most churches simply cannot afford the anticipated increase.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
